data.message: Facebook, the story is that there will be a $2.99 monthly fee starting next month.  I still see your homepage says it is free and always will be... but there are tons of reports this time... True or False?  Inquiring Minds want to know.

replies.message: Thanks for the question, Angela. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. Please disregard this and be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. Thanks for checking in with us! -Elissa
YUP - Meant to back and delete this when I found out it was on a satire site.  Sorry for wasting your time... but you guys ROCK as admins.
